Wilf (Billy Connolly), Reggie (Tom Courtenay) and Cissy (Pauline Collins) live in a home for retired opera singers, where every year the residents do a concert to raise funds for the institution. When Jean Horton (Maggie Smith), a former opera singer in great difficulty and ex-wife of Reggie, moves to the asylum, four of the biggest names in English opera are under one roof and are preparing for a new presentation together.
